metadata.description: Personal productivity plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: subscription-cleanse
plugins.description: Comprehensive subscription audit with bank CSV analysis and email reconnaissance

plugins.name: braintrust
plugins.description: Orchestrate other AI CLIs (Gemini, Codex, Claude Code) for second opinions, research, and codebase analysis

plugins.name: linkedin-message-triage
plugins.description: Systematic LinkedIn inbox review - filter solicitations, identify messages needing responses, draft replies

plugins.name: markdown-to-confluence
plugins.description: Convert Markdown documents to Confluence Storage Format (XHTML-based XML)

plugins.name: cre-property-research
plugins.description: Comprehensive commercial real estate property research and market analysis

plugins.name: 1password-management
plugins.description: Proper syntax, field types, and best practices for managing credentials with 1Password CLI (op)

plugins.name: readme-craft
plugins.description: Write clean, human-sounding README files for personal and open source projects

plugins.name: helpscout-navigator
plugins.description: HelpScout support ticket search with guidance for correct tool usage. Bundles HelpScout MCP server - auto-starts when plugin is enabled.
